name: Three Dwarves
description:
*This project was meant to be a submitted to the Major Jam 4: Cosmic with the Theme: "Player Must Cheat", but we missed the deadline :(*
THREE DWARVES - The Kingdom's Miner Dwarves were sent to a nearby cave to collect resources, What seemed like an ordinary mining job has taken a turn for the worst - THE CAVE IS CURSED! 
You are the Kingdom's Wizard, Equipped with a powerful spell - Summoning a giant hand that pick up the dwarves and rescue them! 
Be wary though, There isn't a lot of time, and so you might need to find a way to cheat! (P.S. the dwarves aren't the sharpest in the kingdom, so don't expect a thank you from them).


How to play: Drag the Dwarves towards the exit using your mouse. 


Credits: 
Nir Zaid - https://nir-zaid.itch.io/
Liad Odvat - https://liadovdat5.itch.io/

Music Used:
"Mushroom Dance" - https://opengameart.org/content/mushroom-dance

SFX Used:
"Level Up, Power Up, Coin Get" by wobbleboxx.com
